name: MultipleSclerosisNewsToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Multiple Sclerosis News Today skill offers Alexa users access to a daily flash briefing on the news and columns published on the Multiple Sclerosis News Today website. Reaching over 150,000 MS patients and caregivers monthly, MS News' goal is to bring the latest science, research and advocacy news to the MS community online. The information in this flash briefing is purely informational and does not constitute medical advice. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
